relevant_findings.bone_marrow_biopsy: Myeloproliferative disorder; cytogenetic testing showed classic Philadelphia chromosome (Ph).

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After starting imatinib, her white blood cell count rose higher than 120 /H1100310^3/µL but later improved to 88 /H1100310^3/µL after a lower dose was administered.

relevant_findings.symptoms: Severe occipital headaches and abdominal rash following initial treatment with imatinib.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms improved after stopping the initial imatinib dosage.
